content.description: Johanna jogs along a straight path. For 0 ≤ t ≤ 40 , Johanna's velocity is given by a differentiable function v. Selected values of v(t), where t is measured in minutes and v(t) is measured in meters per minute, are given in the table above.
content.question: Based on the model B from part (c), find Bob's average velocity during the interval 0 ≤ t ≤ 10.

frqParts.text: Based on the model B from part (c), find Bob's average velocity during the interval 0 ≤ t ≤ 10.

topic.text: 8.1: Finding the Average Value of a Function on an Interval

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
